title: Dear Kalista... or Riot
body:
Can we PLEASE make it so Kalista can't just click me and make me feel like i'm lagging out for 5 seconds?

Yes, I'm talking about her Pact passive...

We had a mid Kalista today and I was support Leona... right after a level 1 teamfight she used it on me and I flat out panicked. I'm fine with being cc'd by the other team but literally just having a teammate be able to click me and make me feel like i'm lagging out was one of the most disturbing feelings I've ever had in this game.

Not kidding... as someone who gets anxiety about not being able to move... especially when I don't know why... having no enemies around and just freezing in place really freaked me out.

Please... just make it so I have to accept her stupid pact. I cannot express how disturbing that experience was.

replies.body:
I do understand I'm an outlying part of the community. Not many people are freaked out by that sort of thing but I seriously just wanted to turn off my computer after that surprise.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cleithrophobia
Don't play with a Kalista or tell her to choose some one else..? o.o
And if they don't listen? I'm supposed to dodge because someone picked that champ? People already barely communicate/read chat in this game.
